Text:
Love your work, Man. Amazing.

Can you please upload these in 1080p x264 AAC

Gladiator (2000)
Heat (1995)
Nacho Libre (2006)
The Fighter (2010)
Pineapple Express (2008)

Please and thank you!

Thanks Zen_Bud anoXmous
A10
V10
Soutitres soi-disant francais:
http://www.subtitleseeker.com/1723642/Sur+la+piste+du+Marsupilami/Subtitles/
SVP aidez moi. Mon niveau de francais n'est pas tres avance. Quelle langue est elle dans les soutitres? Est-ce un argot qui ajoute 'os' apres achque mot? 
Excusez les erreurs. Ma tastiere n'a pas d'accents, et je n'ai pas la patience d'observer ni l'orthographe ni la grammaire de cette langue baroque.

@AsifAkheir

According IMDB it is French !


Country:France | Belgium
Language:French 
Filming Locations:Belgium

@ Zen_Bud

I meant the 'subtitles' not the spoken French. I usually have more problems with speech, so I like to read along with the subtitles. But in this case they not only don't help, they actually confuse me even more. 
By the way the colors are beautiiful! Unfortunately I don't have surround sound, but I'm sure the 5.1 audio is great too. Is it possible to award 11s for audio and video?
